Summary: 25 to 30 blueish lights just slow crusing towards south east 7 inches above horizon line, from my eye view position
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around December 31st 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsit was 735pm i was in the garage with the family, my uncle opend the garage door, then i looked up and 25 to 30 lights graved my attention. I notice because im always looking at that direction at night, im always looking at Jupiter or the moon with my telescope, and i knew those lights or stars weren't suppose to be there. The lights were just flying really slow towards the East, then they started to get dimer i guess they were already to far from our view and just left the scene like a plane leaves and gets smaller when its really far. We were all excited we couldnt take our eyes of them, we all got a gut feeling and knew they weren't from this world, we knew they were something else!
